title: Visual Learning Path for Natural Language Processing Certification
description: This personalized learning path is designed for individuals with intermediate expertise level in Natural Language Processing who prefer a visual learning style. The path aims to prepare learners for certification by covering key concepts through visual aids such as images, diagrams, and spatial understanding.

milestones.title: Introduction to NLP
milestones.description: Understand the basics of Natural Language Processing and its applications

milestones.title: Text Preprocessing Techniques
milestones.description: Learn about text cleaning, tokenization, and normalization

milestones.title: Sentiment Analysis Visualization
milestones.description: Explore sentiment analysis techniques with visual representations

prerequisites: Basic understanding of Natural Language Processing concepts
